answers.answer: This is my 4th also im 21 wks and 6 days and hes deffinatly my last one lol congrats on ur baby and hope u find out what it is
Also my 4th. I'm 21 and 3 days! Def for my last. Also hardest pregnancy. Just found out I got Gestational diabetes.
This is my 4th im 36wks3days with a lil boy. But not my last. Still got to have 2 more so then will have a family of 6! Lol!
4th pregnancy and last for me too..but I do feel sad I won't ever do this again :/...I have two girls and now I will have two boys in Nov

4th pregnancy and the ABSOLUTE last for me. This pregnancy is the worst for me. Swollen feet and ankles at about 9 weeks, bed rest at 24 and I'm experiencing the worst pelvic pain ever. I researched and found out it is called pubic symphysis dysfunction. But overall I'm ready to get it over with and meet my princess :) 27+4 now!
4th pregnancy too, im 24+2 days. Would like to say last but I love being pregnant.
This is my 6th pregnancy and very last one so excited for her to be here only 40 more days to go

This was my last attempt for a girl but it wasn't meant to be so a forth boy is what im having n definitely not having any more this pregnancy has been awful just can't wait to meet him only 6 weeks to go
This is my 4th pregnancy.  I am only 10 weeks trying not to think about how far March 18th is away. I have 3 boys. It has been my best thus far. Lots of fatigue but hardly any morning sickness.
Also I am praying this is my LAST lol girl or no girl I am done
This is my 4th. I'm 22 weeks 4 days with a baby girl. We're gonna try one more time for a little boy.
thank you all for your posts . . good luck to all of you and i hope we all get an easy delivery with a healthy beautiful babies :)

question: hii this is my 4th and last pregnancy hopefully lol. im 18.5 weeks . i will find out the baby gender next week . Anyone the same
title: 4th pregnancy . . me too  :)
